With the help of my professor, I finally get the chance to enter the University of Cambridge.

My agency is so strict with me.

I am strict in my daily trifle.

Digital technologies are ubiquitous at present.

I can tell you just for the present.

My skin was burnt in the sun/sunshine.

There are so many sluty lesbians in the sun.

I wont hurt you at least.

Honestly, I have not even in the least pound.

I can find you by name.

I attend a gigantic rally as an attorney on the air.

So many viruses float in the air during the episode of the epidemic.

My business has not been in the way of my passion for basketball.

It is really good news in a way.

My employer allows I can get my way to do what I want to do.

I wouldnt give way to the torture.

I am on my way to see my friend.

Come this way, that road has been sealed by the cops.

I am always at the back of your perspective.

In the course of the 21st, the pace of technology innovation speeds up.

My agency is so strict with me.

entry.content:
I bought a bouquet() to the splendid banquet().

I was robbed() by a cunning thief, I chased him to get my stuffs back. to get rid() of me, he picked up a rod() to hit me and broke my rib().

To continue() to grope the realm we have never found, the govenment delegate a contingent() to exploit a new continent().

A couple was entrust to probe() the globe(), and after the journal, the boy wrote a prose() to the girl and propose() to her.

I trust() you, so I let you thrust() the car stuck in the hole.

I can get some revenue() from the avenue().

there are so many trifles() stifle() me so much.

After the law being revised(), I devise() a device().

You breach() my rule, you have no right to breath().

There is a wreck() park in the dock(). under the deck(), a parrot is pecking().

I intruded() the factory really rudely(), and I saw many crude() jars on the working mechine.

I disgust() the role Peter disguise().

I dismay() that you was dismissed() by you employer.

That is definately a prospective() perspective().

Wearing a vague() sungrasses becomes the vogue() in 21st century.

I met my ally() in a alley().

I perceived() that you have deceived() me when I received() the conceive() I came up with this monday.

the professor I respect() is inspecting() every aspect() of the mechine with so much expect(). but when I retrospect() some stuffs in the past, I suspect() his capacity.

The entertainment is a component() of peoplelife, I am a exponent() of Taylor Swift who is a opponent() of the Owl City.

Aspiring() to become a actor, I inspired() by the Melissa Banino and conspire() a excellent tactic to expire() the contract of my last job in the Lenovo.

I am going to wreck() the wreck() of the wreck() in this trench() with a wrench(), but it wrench() my wrist.
entry.summary:
I bought a bouquet() to the splendid banquet().

I was robbed() by a cunning thief, I chased him to get my stuffs back. to get rid() of me, he picked up a rod() to hit me and broke my rib().

1.Theres no feeling more frustrating than having dirty hair, showering and emerging with your hair greasy after washing it.

theres no + +more + + than + A().

for example:

  • theres no people more famous than him.

  • theres no zoo more interesting than it.

2.something is likely off.

3.make sure your clean hair is actually clean.

make sure +

4.Im not in the mood.

5.what do you do for a living.

6.help sb. out

7.But fewer can claim to be as stratified as Rome.

8.Civilisations that have taken root here over millennia seem to justle for prominence at every turn.

  • take root :

    • Core socialist values should take root among the people.

    • And those tales have taken root deep inside of me.

  • jostle for : compete for

    • Ten candidates jostled to become leader of Britains Conservative Party, and thus the countrys next prime minister.

  • at every turn :

9.But it is sometimes a disadvantage to be so guarded.

  • it is + + to do :

    • it is stuip to go to the hospital.

  • it is + a/an + +to do :

    • it is a stuip thing to go to the hospital.

10.Theres been no shortage of warnings about the career dangers of posting racy content on sites like Facebook and Twitter.

FacebookTwitter

  • theres been no shortage of warnings about XXX : XXX
entry.summary:
1.Theres no feeling more frustrating than having dirty hair, showering and emerging with your hair greasy after washing it.

theres no + +more + + than + A().

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment
entry.summary:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start
